extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.1.3 - Aug. 05, 2021[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added new setting [B]"Prefer TMDb artwork (poster, fanart)"[/B] in the [B]"General"[/B] category. Now you can set TMDb as preferred artwork even if retrieving fanart.tv for for it's clearlogo, clearart, etc.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Prem-Emptive Termination quit before hitting it's limit.
